meanings.definition: A thin cord or strip of material used to fasten or tie something.
meanings.sent1: She tied the package with a shoestring.
meanings.sent2: He always carries a spare shoestring in his bag.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with the shoestring, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as fragile as a shoestring.
meanings.sent5: The shoestring held the tent together during the storm.

meanings.definition: A very small amount of money or resources.
meanings.sent1: They managed to start the business on a shoestring.
meanings.sent2: Living on a shoestring budget requires careful planning.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his wallet was feeling the pinch of the shoestring.
meanings.sent4: Her hopes of traveling rested on a shoestring of savings.
meanings.sent5: The project survived on a shoestring and a prayer.
